mapper.select: select * from config_package where platform like CONCAT('%', #{platform}, '%') and (is_public = '*' or is_public like CONCAT('%', #{ip}, '%')) and (allow_channel = '*' or allow_channel like CONCAT('%', #{channelId}, '%') ) and deny_channel not like CONCAT('%', #{channelId}, '%') and (allow_version = '*' or allow_version like CONCAT('%', #{versionId}, '%')) and deny_version not like CONCAT('%', #{versionId}, '%') and status = '1' and sysdate() >= release_time order by release_time

select id,version,allow_channel allowChannel,deny_channel denyChannel,allow_version allowVersion, deny_version denyVersion,is_public isPublic,platform,status, release_time releaseTime from config_package

select version,allow_channel allowChannel,deny_channel denyChannel,allow_version allowVersion, deny_version denyVersion,is_public isPublic,game_info gameInfo,platform,status, release_time releaseTime,apk_update_url apkUpdateUrl,`size` from config_package where id = #{id}
